name: ZD Header Tags
author: Proloy Chakroborty

sections.description:
This plugin will let you put your own title, keywords and description meta tags for each post.

Its a great tool for SEO.

This plugin helps you to put CSS Link tags, JavaScript Script tag and Other Meta tags between HTML from admin page.

Also put your own title, keywords and description for home page and also use home page keywords and description as default.

You will find a “ZD Header Tags” Box on right panel of Post/Page writer screen to type in you title, keywords and description for particular post/page.

Usage

You will find a “ZD Header Tags” Box on right panel of Post/Page writer screen to type in you title, keywords and description for particular post/page.

Support

Email at support@proloy.me
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Add title, keywords and description into “ZD Header Tags” Box on right panel of Post/Page writer screen. Use Admin page to add other tags.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.0

30-Jan-2008

  • Beta Release

Version 1.1.0

31-Jan-2008

  • Empty Keyword and Description Bug Fixed
  • Home Keywords and Description added.
  • Also use home page keywords and descrition as default.

Version 2.0

15-Oct-2008

  • Minor and Major Bug Fixing
  • ZD Header Tag Box Add into Post/Page Writer screen for easy editing title, keywords and description
  • Admin Page Enehanced
  • CSS, Meta and Javascript tag now inserted as HTML
  • Disable Custom Fields Box on Post/Page Writer screen option added

Version 2.1

16-Oct-2008

  • Bug Fixing – Home Page title now don’t have double separators
